metadata.source: Based on SRD 5.1 and DMG encounter building rules

encounter_multipliers.description: Multiplier applied based on number of monsters (DMG p.82)

monsters.name: Bandit
monsters.tactics: Attacks in groups, uses light crossbows at range, surrenders when outnumbered.

monsters.name: Bandit Captain
monsters.tactics: Commands bandits, uses multiattack and parry reaction. Bargains if losing.

monsters.name: Goblin
monsters.tactics: Uses Nimble Escape to disengage/hide. Sets ambushes, uses hit-and-run tactics.

monsters.name: Hobgoblin
monsters.tactics: Uses Martial Advantage with allies. Fights in disciplined formations.

monsters.name: Hobgoblin Captain
monsters.tactics: Commands hobgoblin squads. Uses Leadership to boost allies, multiattacks.

monsters.name: Bugbear
monsters.tactics: Surprise attacks for extra damage, uses reach with morningstar.

monsters.name: Bugbear Chief
monsters.tactics: Leads bugbear war bands. Uses Heart of Hruggek for extra damage.

monsters.name: Orc
monsters.tactics: Uses Aggressive to close distance quickly. Attacks with greataxe.

monsters.name: Orc War Chief
monsters.tactics: Uses Gruumsh's Fury and Battle Cry. Commands orc war bands.

monsters.name: Kobold
monsters.tactics: Pack Tactics for advantage. Sets traps, uses Sunlight Sensitivity disadvantage.

monsters.name: Gnoll
monsters.tactics: Uses Rampage to chain kills. Savage pack hunters, relentless pursuit.

monsters.name: Gnoll Pack Lord
monsters.tactics: Incites allies to attack. Uses Rampage aggressively.

monsters.name: Skeleton
monsters.tactics: Uses shortbow or shortsword. Follows commands mindlessly, fights until destroyed.

monsters.name: Zombie
monsters.tactics: Undead Fortitude keeps it fighting. Slow but relentless, overwhelms with numbers.

monsters.name: Ghoul
monsters.tactics: Claws paralyze targets. Hunts in packs, devours paralyzed prey.

monsters.name: Ghast
monsters.tactics: Stench sickens nearby. Commands ghouls, claws paralyze.

monsters.name: Wight
monsters.tactics: Life Drain creates zombies. Uses longsword and longbow. Commands lesser undead.

monsters.name: Specter
monsters.tactics: Incorporeal movement through walls. Life Drain attack. Sunlight sensitive.

monsters.name: Shadow
monsters.tactics: Strength Drain creates new shadows. Hides in darkness, ambushes.

monsters.name: Wraith
monsters.tactics: Creates specters from slain. Incorporeal, Life Drain attack.

monsters.name: Mummy
monsters.tactics: Dreadful Glare frightens. Rotting Fist curse. Guards tombs.

monsters.name: Vampire Spawn
monsters.tactics: Bite to regain HP. Claws and regeneration. Serves master vampire.

monsters.name: Wolf
monsters.tactics: Pack Tactics with allies. Bite knocks prone. Hunts in packs.

monsters.name: Dire Wolf
monsters.tactics: Pack Tactics, bite knocks prone. Alpha leads pack.

monsters.name: Brown Bear
monsters.tactics: Multiattack with bite and claws. Defends territory aggressively.

monsters.name: Giant Spider
monsters.tactics: Web restrains prey. Venomous bite. Spider Climb for ambush.

monsters.name: Giant Wolf Spider
monsters.tactics: Stealth ambush, venomous bite, climbs walls.

monsters.name: Giant Rat
monsters.tactics: Pack Tactics in numbers. Swarms, spreads disease.

monsters.name: Swarm of Rats
monsters.tactics: Resistance to damage. Overwhelms prey, spreads disease.

monsters.name: Giant Scorpion
monsters.tactics: Grapples with claws, stings for poison. Ambushes from sand.

monsters.name: Giant Constrictor Snake
monsters.tactics: Constricts and squeezes. Ambushes from concealment.

monsters.name: Crocodile
monsters.tactics: Ambushes from water, grapples with bite, drowns prey.

monsters.name: Giant Crocodile
monsters.tactics: Grapples with massive bite. Death roll. Drowns prey.

monsters.name: Polar Bear
monsters.tactics: Multiattack with bite and claws. Keen smell, powerful swimmer.

monsters.name: Saber-Toothed Tiger
monsters.tactics: Pounce knocks prone. Savage bite, pack hunter.

monsters.name: Giant Boar
monsters.tactics: Charge with tusks. Relentless trait keeps fighting.

monsters.name: Owlbear
monsters.tactics: Multiattack with beak and claws. Savage, territorial.

monsters.name: Basilisk
monsters.tactics: Petrifying Gaze turns to stone. Guards lair.

monsters.name: Cockatrice
monsters.tactics: Petrifying bite. Attacks petrified victims.

monsters.name: Harpy
monsters.tactics: Luring Song charms. Attacks charmed prey.

monsters.name: Manticore
monsters.tactics: Tail spikes at range. Multiattack in melee. Cruel hunter.

monsters.name: Phase Spider
monsters.tactics: Ethereal Jaunt to phase in/out. Venomous bite.

monsters.name: Mimic
monsters.tactics: Disguises as chest/door. Adhesive grapples, pseudopod attacks.

monsters.name: Rust Monster
monsters.tactics: Rusts metal on touch. Targets armored foes. Not aggressive.

monsters.name: Ankheg
monsters.tactics: Burrows to ambush. Grapples and drags underground, acid spray.

monsters.name: Ettercap
monsters.tactics: Sets web traps, commands spiders, attacks webbed victims.

monsters.name: Grick
monsters.tactics: Stone Camouflage ambush. Tentacles then beak.

monsters.name: Hook Horror
monsters.tactics: Echolocation in darkness. Multiattack with hooks. Pack hunter.

monsters.name: Displacer Beast
monsters.tactics: Displacement makes it hard to hit. Tentacle attacks.

monsters.name: Winter Wolf
monsters.tactics: Cold Breath on groups. Pack Tactics. Intelligent hunter.

monsters.name: Worg
monsters.tactics: Goblin mount. Bites and knocks prone. Evil and intelligent.

monsters.name: Yeti
monsters.tactics: Chilling Gaze paralyzes. Claw attacks, immune to cold.

monsters.name: Ogre
monsters.tactics: Throws javelins, greatclub in melee. Stupid and greedy.

monsters.name: Troll
monsters.tactics: Regenerates constantly. Fire/acid stops healing. Multiattack.

monsters.name: Ettin
monsters.tactics: Two-headed advantage on saves. Battleaxe and morningstar.

monsters.name: Hill Giant
monsters.tactics: Throws rocks, greatclub. Stupid but strong, loves food.

monsters.name: Stone Giant
monsters.tactics: Throws and catches rocks. Greatclub in melee.

monsters.name: Frost Giant
monsters.tactics: Throws rocks, greataxe. Raids and pillages.

monsters.name: Fire Giant
monsters.tactics: Throws rocks, greatsword. Military discipline.

monsters.name: Imp
monsters.tactics: Invisibility, sting poison. Serves as familiar, cowardly.

monsters.name: Quasit
monsters.tactics: Shapeshifts, Scare ability. Familiar, cowardly.

monsters.name: Hell Hound
monsters.tactics: Fire Breath on groups. Pack Tactics. Relentless.

monsters.name: Nightmare
monsters.tactics: Ethereal Stride escape. Flaming hooves, evil mount.

monsters.name: Barbed Devil
monsters.tactics: Barbed hide hurts grapplers. Throws flames.

monsters.name: Bearded Devil
monsters.tactics: Aggressive melee. Beard infects wounds.

monsters.name: Dust Mephit
monsters.tactics: Blinding Breath, Death Burst on death.

monsters.name: Ice Mephit
monsters.tactics: Frost Breath, Death Burst. Harasses from flight.

monsters.name: Steam Mephit
monsters.tactics: Steam Breath, Death Burst. Harasses from flight.

monsters.name: Magma Mephit
monsters.tactics: Fire Breath, Death Burst. Harasses.

monsters.name: Air Elemental
monsters.tactics: Whirlwind scatters party. Slam attacks.

monsters.name: Earth Elemental
monsters.tactics: Earth Glide through stone. Siege Monster.

monsters.name: Fire Elemental
monsters.tactics: Ignites flammables. Touch sets ablaze.

monsters.name: Water Elemental
monsters.tactics: Whelm engulfs targets. Controls water.

monsters.name: Dryad
monsters.tactics: Charm Person on intruders. Tree Stride escape.

monsters.name: Satyr
monsters.tactics: Ram charge attack. Pipes for magic. Avoids combat.

monsters.name: Sprite
monsters.tactics: Invisibility, Heart Sight. Poison arrows to sleep.

monsters.name: Green Hag
monsters.tactics: Illusory Appearance, Invisible Passage. Claws if cornered.

monsters.name: Sea Hag
monsters.tactics: Horrific Appearance frightens. Death Glare kills frightened.

monsters.name: Animated Armor
monsters.tactics: Follows commands. Attacks nearest, fights until destroyed.

monsters.name: Flying Sword
monsters.tactics: Follows commands. Slashes at nearest.

monsters.name: Rug of Smothering
monsters.tactics: Appears as normal rug. Grapples and smothers.

monsters.name: Gargoyle
monsters.tactics: False Appearance as statue. Ambushes, multiattack.

monsters.name: Flesh Golem
monsters.tactics: Berserk when damaged. Immune to most spells.

monsters.name: Gray Ooze
monsters.tactics: Ambushes as stone. Corrodes metal.

monsters.name: Ochre Jelly
monsters.tactics: Splits when hit with lightning/slashing. Dissolves organics.

monsters.name: Black Pudding
monsters.tactics: Splits when hit. Dissolves metal and wood.

monsters.name: Gelatinous Cube
monsters.tactics: Transparent. Engulfs creatures, digests slowly.

monsters.name: Violet Fungus
monsters.tactics: Rotting Touch. Disguises among fungi.

monsters.name: Awakened Tree
monsters.tactics: False Appearance. Slam attacks, guards area.

monsters.name: Shambling Mound
monsters.tactics: Engulfs and suffocates. Absorbs lightning.

monsters.name: Gibbering Mouther
monsters.tactics: Gibbering confuses. Blinding spittle, absorbs flesh.

monsters.name: Grell
monsters.tactics: Floats silently. Tentacles grapple and paralyze.

monsters.name: Intellect Devourer
monsters.tactics: Devour Intellect stuns. Body Thief takes over.

monsters.name: Chuul
monsters.tactics: Pincers grapple. Paralyzing tentacles.

monsters.name: Otyugh
monsters.tactics: Tentacles grapple. Bite causes disease.

monsters.name: Doppelganger
monsters.tactics: Shapechanger infiltrates. Reads thoughts, surprise attacks.

monsters.name: Werewolf
monsters.tactics: Hybrid form multiattack. Spreads lycanthropy.

monsters.name: Wererat
monsters.tactics: Sneaky, hand crossbow. Spreads lycanthropy.

monsters.name: Young Green Dragon
monsters.tactics: Poison Breath in cone. Cunning, manipulates before fighting.

monsters.name: Young Black Dragon
monsters.tactics: Acid Breath. Ambushes from murky water.

monsters.name: Young White Dragon
monsters.tactics: Cold Breath. Savage and bestial.

monsters.name: Young Red Dragon
monsters.tactics: Fire Breath. Arrogant, hoards treasure.

monsters.name: Young Blue Dragon
monsters.tactics: Lightning Breath. Burrows to ambush.

monsters.name: Green Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.tactics: Poison Breath. Cunning even when young.

monsters.name: Black Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.tactics: Acid Breath. Hides in water.

monsters.name: White Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.tactics: Cold Breath. Aggressive.

monsters.name: Red Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.tactics: Fire Breath. Already arrogant.

monsters.name: Blue Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.tactics: Lightning Breath. Territorial.

monsters.name: Wyvern
monsters.tactics: Multiattack with bite, claws, stinger. Poisonous sting.

monsters.name: Guard
monsters.tactics: Calls for backup. Spear attacks, fights in groups.

monsters.name: Scout
monsters.tactics: Longbow at range. Multiattack, flees to report.

monsters.name: Thug
monsters.tactics: Pack Tactics. Multiattack, intimidates.

monsters.name: Spy
monsters.tactics: Sneak Attack. Cunning Action, gathers intel.

monsters.name: Berserker
monsters.tactics: Reckless Attack always. Fights until dead.

monsters.name: Knight
monsters.tactics: Leadership ability. Greatsword multiattack, mounted.

monsters.name: Veteran
monsters.tactics: Multiattack with longsword and shortsword. Experienced.

monsters.name: Assassin
monsters.tactics: Assassinate from surprise. Poison, flees if discovered.

monsters.name: Mage
monsters.tactics: Opens with Cone of Cold or Fireball. Shield, Misty Step.

monsters.name: Priest
monsters.tactics: Spirit Guardians. Healing spells, supports allies.

monsters.name: Cult Fanatic
monsters.tactics: Hold Person. Spiritual Weapon, leads cultists.

monsters.name: Cultist
monsters.tactics: Attacks in groups. Fanatically loyal.

monsters.name: Acolyte
monsters.tactics: Supports with healing. Sacred Flame at range.

monsters.name: Druid
monsters.tactics: Wild Shape for combat. Entangle, Thunderwave.

monsters.name: Drow
monsters.tactics: Darkness, Faerie Fire. Poisoned crossbow bolts.

monsters.name: Drow Elite Warrior
monsters.tactics: Superior Darkvision. Multiattack with shortswords.

monsters.name: Duergar
monsters.tactics: Enlarge for combat. Invisibility ambush.

monsters.name: Grimlock
monsters.tactics: Blind Senses. Stone Camouflage, fights in darkness.

monsters.name: Mind Flayer
monsters.tactics: Mind Blast stuns. Extract Brain kills. Psionics.

monsters.name: Troglodyte
monsters.tactics: Stench sickens nearby. Multiattack, ambushes.

monsters.name: Kuo-Toa
monsters.tactics: Sticky Shield grapples. Spear attacks, worships mad gods.

monsters.name: Quaggoth
monsters.tactics: Wounded Fury when bloodied. Climbing, berserker rage.

monsters.name: Deep Gnome (Svirfneblin)
monsters.tactics: Stone Camouflage. War pick and poison darts.

monsters.name: Drider
monsters.tactics: Web and darkness. Longbow at range, bites in melee.

monsters.name: Roper
monsters.tactics: False Appearance. Tendrils grapple and reel in.

monsters.name: Umber Hulk
monsters.tactics: Confusing Gaze. Burrows, multiattack with claws.

monsters.name: Purple Worm
monsters.tactics: Swallows whole. Tail stinger poison. Tunnels.

monsters.name: Beholder Zombie
monsters.tactics: Eye rays at random. Mindless but dangerous.

monsters.name: Darkmantle
monsters.tactics: Darkness Aura. Drops from ceiling, crushes.

monsters.name: Piercer
monsters.tactics: False Appearance. Drops from ceiling for massive damage.

monsters.name: Carrion Crawler
monsters.tactics: Paralytic tentacles. Multiattack, eats corpses.

monsters.name: Myconid Adult
monsters.tactics: Rapport Spores for communication. Pacifying Spores.

monsters.name: Myconid Sovereign
monsters.tactics: Animating Spores create servants. Leads colony.

monsters.name: Xorn
monsters.tactics: Earth Glide ambush. Demands gems, multiattack.

monsters.name: Galeb Duhr
monsters.tactics: False Appearance. Animates boulders, rolling charge.

monsters.name: Salamander
monsters.tactics: Heated Body burns grapplers. Spear and tail attacks.

monsters.name: Giant Bat
monsters.tactics: Echolocation. Bite attacks, flees from fire.
